summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Arabic quote management system. All core functionality working including quote CRUD operations, company management, RTL Arabic interface, export functionality (PDF/Excel), and automatic tax calculations.

integration_issues.issue: Customer name update may not reflect immediately in quote view (possible caching issue)

design_issues.issue: HTML dir attribute not explicitly set to 'rtl' (though RTL styling works via CSS)

passed_tests: Quote CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
PDF export functionality from backend and frontend
Excel export functionality from backend and frontend
Homepage loading with RTL Arabic interface
Quote creation workflow with automatic calculations
Arabic text rendering and RTL layout
Form validation and user input handling
Statistics display (total quotes, total value, monthly count)
